channel.title: Copy of Digg top 24 hours
channel.description: RSS feed with direct links to popular technology articles. based on superdigg pipe

item.title: [+3480] Why we should ditch religion
item.description: For the world to tackle truly important problems, people have to stop looking to religion to guide their moral compasses, the philosopher Sam Harris told.

item.title: [+1925] This Chick Has Some Skills
item.description: She solves a Rubik cube while balancing ten books on her head and reciting pi to the 100th decimal

item.title: [+1717] The Permission Slip
item.description: Most parents sign and return field trip permission slips without even giving them a thought or 2nd glance. Not this guy...

item.title: [+1644] $205 Million Found In 1 Guy's House.... (pics)
item.description: That's a lot of money (and bills) in 1 place -- seized from a drug lord. Here, a pic of what it looks like, along w/some other examples of a lot of money "in one place" -- e.g., the 100 million pennies collected & displayed at Rockefeller Center NYC.

item.title: [+1266] Funniest Beer Commercial Ever [Vid]
item.description: Every year Big Rock Brewery in Calgary has a contest for people to make commercials up to promote their beer This is one entry that has to be one of the funniest beer commercials of all-time.

item.title: [+916] OMG Cat Sees a Car Accident
item.description: I don't know if there is anything wrong because I don't know how other people are.

item.title: [+902] Virgin Galactic's Commercial Spaceship Revealed (Graphic)
item.description: This week, Virgin Galactic's VSS Enterprise, attached to its mother ship, the VSS Eve, successfully completed the very first test flight. The craft took off on an two hour 53 minute flight achieving an altitude of 45,000 feet.

item.title: [+889] He keeps going higher and higher ..... [GIF]
[+777] State May Penalize Slow Drivers
item.description: Is there anything more irritating on your morning commute than slow-moving drivers who refuse to extricate themselves from the passing lane?

item.title: [+776] Ex-SNL Star Victoria Jackson is too Crazy Even for Fox News
item.description: You know you’re talking crazy when the Fox News guy has to nervously defend Barack Obama.

item.title: [+759] Xbox 360 USB data storage announced, coming April 6
item.description: Look at Major Nelson, dropping the scoop about USB hard drive support being added to the Xbox 360 like it's news to you.

item.title: [+737] iPad App Store screenshots leaked
item.description: Well, look at this. If you've been desperate to know what your App Store experience would be like on the iPad, here's a chance to live the dream.

item.title: [+723] The Truth About Educational TV Channels [Chart]
item.description: Discovery Channel, TLC and The History Channel were all created to educate us on all sorts of interesting things right? After checking this chart you may want to reconsider that statement.

item.title: [+712] NVIDIA GeForce GTX 480: GF100 Has Landed
item.description: Depending on your perspective, today will either be a victory or a crushing defeat for NVIDIA. The company produced what is undoubtedly the most powerful Graphics Processor ever. The 3-Billion transistor GF100 is a very capable chip, both in terms of gaming and compute performance. However, the GeForce GTX 480 is late to the market and...

item.title: [+709] Health Care Spending: U.S. vs. Abroad [Infographic]
item.description: Examine the current cost of America’s health care system — before the reform takes shape — and you'll see that the U.S. already spends more than any other developed nation. This is while we still offer an underperforming system. With the recent sweeping changes, we have to ask, what's coming next?

item.title: [+690] Stunning Pictures of Sleeping Insects Covered in Dew Drops
item.description: Glistening in the early morning, these insects look like creatures from another planet as dew gathers on their sleeping bodies.

item.title: [+686] BIG Wheels! [Pic]

item.description: hellz yeah. that's how you get them hoes

item.title: [+638] Can You Spot The Bored Guy? (PIC)
[+617] 17-year-old girl commits suicide: a victim of cyberbullying?
item.description: Even after her death, a high school soccer star's Facebook memorial pageis littered with insults, sexually suggestive comments, even pictures ofnooses and people with their heads blown off.
